channel.title: Suggestion: Help the noobies
channel.description: Why doesn't anyone here help the people who ask for SERIOUS HELP? I can understand someone like: OMG HALP HOW I START SERVER PLZ. But civil questions, I myself am a "senior member" and know a bit about java and can get by on my own usually. But when I need help I don't even know if it's worth asking for because one of two things happens usually: 1: Nothing 2: someone esle says "I need this too" There are many amazing coders on this website who post some great tuts. But the tuts are getting repetitive and leeched ALL the time. I wish people would help other people asking a normal, civil question.

item.title: Suggestion: Help the noobies
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

After private servers move to moparisthebest.com, there should be less questions in total and more of them in the correct boards, which should aid in the answering of all questions. Until then just answer as many as you can ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Help the noobies
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

makes sense, but i don’t ask any questions anymore i don’t like getting flamed…hahaha

item.title: Suggestion: Help the noobies
item.dc:creator: @Hadoku Hadoku
item.description:
@Hadoku wrote:

Why doesn’t anyone here help the people who ask for SERIOUS HELP? I can understand someone like: OMG HALP HOW I START SERVER PLZ. But civil questions, I myself am a “senior member” and know a bit about java and can get by on my own usually. But when I need help I don’t even know if it’s worth asking for because one of two things happens usually:
1: Nothing
2: someone esle says “I need this too”
There are many amazing coders on this website who post some great tuts. But the tuts are getting repetitive and leeched ALL the time. I wish people would help other people asking a normal, civil question.
